title: I need the following t201 cards

posts.post_title: I need the following t201 cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bryan Long
Some I can afford and some I can't, but I have a little extra cash to spend right now so I thought I would list them all.  I was going after the commons first, but if someone has some HOFers that I need (which is most) and I can afford them - great for me.
Thanks,
Bryan

Harry Baker/Thomas Downie
